name: Github Cat
address: 416 Sid Snyder Ave SW Olympia, WA 98501

notices.title: Notice of Unsigned Ballot Envelope
notices.subtitle: Signature needs verification
notices.description: We received your ballot for the election. However, you did not sign the back of your envelope. To count a ballot, state law requires a signature on the return envelope.
notices.actiondescription:
Fill out this form nos later than 4 p.m. on November 8, 2023.
Download signature verification form
notices.returninstruction: List out the options for sending back the form back. Include mail, email, fax, in-person, and add the digital option to upload the form if eligible.
